snippet: Danger Room, a military blog on Wired.com, reaches an audience the Pentagon sometimes has trouble connecting with: people in its own ranks.
abstract: Danger Room, a military blog on Wired.com, reaches an audience the Pentagon sometimes has trouble connecting with: people in its own ranks.

headline.main: A National Security Blog From Wired Widens Its Reach
